cz.cesnet.cloud.occi.api.http.auth

Class HTTPAuthentication

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cesnet.cloud.occi.api.http.auth.HTTPAuthentication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Authentication
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasicAuthentication, CertificateAuthentication, KeystoneAuthentication, NoAuthentication

    public abstract class HTTPAuthentication
extends Object
implements Authentication
    Abstract class representing HTTP authentication methods. Lets set either directory path or file containing CAs and uses them during establishing of connection.
    Author:
    Michal Kimle

      • loadCAs

        protected KeyStore loadCAs()
                    throws AuthenticationException
        Loads custom CAs either from file or directory. If both set, CA file has higher priority.
        Returns:
        keystore with custom CAs loaded
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException
